players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Everyone, I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso."
Diana: "Bob is lying. He's trying to frame me because he knows I'm a villager. Why would he reveal this so early if he were a real detective?"
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you choose to reveal your findings so soon? Diana, what do you have to say in your defense?"
Diana: "Charlie, consider this: if Bob were truly the detective, why would he expose himself and become a target this early? His strategy only makes sense if he's trying to mislead us."

You: "Charlie, I revealed my findings early because we only have one mafioso to catch, and it's crucial to take action quickly before more town members are eliminated. Diana is the biggest threat to the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
